
# Normal

```{r}
theme_grey
```

```{r}
set.seed(123)
N <- 100
xx <- rnorm(N)
yy <- rnorm(N, xx)

dat <- tibble(xx, yy)
```

```{r}

p1 <- ggplot(dat, aes(x = xx, y = yy)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_grey()

p1

```


```{r}
p1 + theme(axis.title.x =  element_text(size = rel(2)))
```
